resources.string:
Objective:
 • Get closer to 21 than the dealer without going over
 • If you go over 21, you "bust" and lose


Card Values:
 • Number cards (2-10): Face value
 • Face cards (Jack, Queen, King): 10
 • Ace: 11 or 1 (automatically adjusted to help you)


Gameplay:
 1. You and the dealer each get 2 cards
 2. Your options:
 • Hit: Take another card
 • Stand: Keep your current hand
 3. Dealer must hit on 16 or below and stand on 17 or above


Winning:
 • Get closer to 21 than the dealer
 • Dealer busts (goes over 21)
 • Push (tie) if you and dealer have same total
